title: Rito: What the fuck is this?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/61caWml.jpg

This dick been holding out on me....

replies.body:
You don't want that, it's not what you think it is.

It is Scuttlecrab blood, the most concentrated source of NaCl in existence.

Riven drank one drop. ONE DROP. Now look at her playerbase.
Lee Sin drank a drop once... It went the same way as Riven players.
Pretty sure we can put the Vayne playerbase in there too. I heard that she only got a brief smell...
Yasuo playerbase had the full bottle

You know its bad when Yasuo wants some of that mana pot.

{{champion:34}} :Yas... what are you doing with five mana pots...
{{champion:157}} -shaking like a crack addict- MAGICAL JOURNEY AINT GOT NOTHING ON THIS!
joke's on all of you, riven, vayne and yasuo playerbase are actually the same people :P

{{champion:157}} Only 3 things are guaranteed in life...
Honor, Death, and a good DSAKLFJKLASFKLSDAJF;SDLFDKSFADJSL;DFJADKSJ
Life is guaranteed in life? What a plot twist.
Idfk the quote I don't play Yasuo.
"There are three certainties in life: honor, death, and hangovers."
I mean, I'd be a pretty salty Scuttlecrab, too, if people kept trying to kill me when I'm just out trying to provide for my family. :c
B-But... H-Hes just sleeping in the river....r-right? http://media.tumblr.com/01408b9eeaa0bb4b6eb384b59013f30d/tumblr_inline_nkh8fbfk4m1skjswm.gif
Little did we know, he was pacing around, distracting people from his family's nest that is burrowed underneath blue buff.
This got really dark.
Isn't actually non-Riven players the ones that are salty about her?
Not when she's on your team and whining like the bitch she is
Nobody can beat Kata mains at complaining.
I thought those were extinct.
If Scuttlecrab blood was similar to water, it could hold 37.5g of NaCl in 100mL :)
man, they need some potatoes
I'm confused as to what potatoes have to do with it?
Potatoes are really good at absorbing salt.
Why do we buy things from him? Just ransack the place at level 1 and go to lane fully geared. Take the balloon as well.
Dude he has like 40-something finished items, I ain't messin' with that guy.
Can anyone calculate his stats?

What he has on display:
{{item:3116}} = +400 HP, +100 AP
{{item:3158}} = +10% CDR, +45 MS
{{item:3153}} = +25 AD, +40% AS, +10% Lifesteal
{{item:3031}} = +65 AD, +20% Crit chance, +50% Crit damage
{{item:1036}} x2 = +20 AD
{{item:3108}} = +25 AP, +10% CDR

All summed up:
+400 HP
+20% CDR
+20% Crit Chance
+50% Crit Damage
+40% Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+45 MS
+125 AP
+110 AD

-------------
Just for fun, here's what the lady on the other side of the Rift has:
{{item:3116}} = +400 HP, +100 AP
{{item:3027}} = +300 HP, +400 Mana, +80 AP (at 0 minutes in)
{{item:3031}} = +65 AD, +20% Crit chance, +50% Crit damage
{{item:3153}} = +25 AD, +40% AS, +10% Lifesteal
{{item:1036}} = +10 AD
{{item:3154}} = +12 AD, +30% AS
{{item:3157}} = +100 AP, +45 Armor
{{item:3152}} = +80 AP, +10% CDR

Total:
+700 HP
+45 Armor
+400 Mana
+70% Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal
+20% Crit Chance
+50% Crit Damage
+10% CDR
+112 AD
+180 AP

-----------------

TL;DR: If you want to pick off a shop keeper, it's best to try the Redside shopkeeper. He's got less stats out in the open to call on...
Definitely 1k everything. His health and mana? Just forget it.

Take every item on the game (everyone, not only finished items), multiply it by 31 (6 slots * 5 players + 1 extra he still offers you even if you can't buy it).

With Infinite Edge alone he has:

2015 AD, 100% (620%) crit chance, 250% crit damage. So, only with IE, his basic attacks deal 5,037.5 damage. You better don't mess with him.
He has at least 30 of every item. His stats are over 9000.

Just for shits and giggles. Adding up all the items x31 (5 ppl x6 items each + 1 extra that he is still able to sell you) with the passives from just seraphs, muramana, deathcap, and cinderhulk:

You have:

508,013 Health
39,215 Armor
91,693 Ability Power
46,190 Attack Damage
16,709% Attack Speed
2,325% Lifesteal
210,800 Mana
24,490 Magic Resist
70,625% Base Health Regen
43,500% Base Mana Regen

This isn't without item passives and stuff like that.
Even Baron Nashor knows not to meddle with him. He tried once... and look where he ended up.
As a passionate Veigar and Xerath player, I cried after I read the amount of AP
I know right. 50 gold for a {{item:2003}}. The economy must have crashed like Wall Street.
Now I imagine Corki coming into lane with a gigantic airship stolen from the shopkeeper.
It's the secret sauce he puts in your {{item:2031}} to make it a {{item:2033}}
He ads a dab of it to your poro snax {{item:2054}}
Well, he also has Heart of Gold _SOOO..._
The shop keeper on twisted treeline has a Thornmail, yet he doesn't sell it

Because he is wearing it dummy SO OBV ._.

Would you sell the pants that you are wearing right now ??? OFC NOT
Well... depends on the situation ;)
I knew he had a villainous look about him... What other pirated goods do you have in their Mr. Whiskers?
I bet that bastard has a DFG in there.

This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You drink the blue potion - the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You drink the red potion - you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes.

Never trust an otter  
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/477/335/9fc.gif
Mana poots cunfurmed
It's a shop premium item. You need a VIP Rito pass to get your hands on one of those.
Surely there must have been a debonair Galio in that game.

That's Elixir of Sorcery's unreleased cousin Elixir of Mana Regen...

Even though mana potions aren't in the game anymore, it wouldn't look as good being purple or green instead of blue. They could switch it with a Biscuit of Rejuvenation though.
I wonder if these mysterious blue potions will later be added into the game?  Hmmmmm

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/32/Blue_Team_Shopkeeper.jpg
*Both* shopkeepers are in this conspiracy man. (there was a picture of the other shopkeeper but i fucked it up so just use your imagination) 
Edit: Thank you PaladinNO
